item.title: Baeysian optimisation of particle beam distribution
Fourier analysis of power converters ripple
item.description: Ripple in the current powering the magents used for particle transport have a considerable effect on the central position of the transported particle beam. Being able to find any pattern or correlation among the ripple in different converters on hte same line would allow to foresee the current values and therefore compensate for the ripple using a control loop. \ For this project, an analysis of the ripple in the power converters of the TT41 beam transport line at CERN is presented.
